<EFX_OFFICER_TRANSACTIONS>
<A NAME="FIS_OFFICER_TRANSACTIONS"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<A NAME="CDXC_10K_HTM_ITEM13">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Item 13.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Certain Relationships
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	and Related Transactions, and Director Independence
</FONT>
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Transactions with Related Persons
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	On August 28, 2015, the Company entered into an Exclusive Supply Agreement (the &#8220;Supply Agreement&#8221;) with Healthspan Research, LLC (&#8220;Healthspan&#8221;).&#160;&#160;Under the terms of the Supply Agreement, Healthspan agreed to purchase NIAGEN&#174; from the Company and the Company granted to Healthspan worldwide rights for resale of specific dietary supplements containing NIAGEN&#174; in certain markets.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Pursuant to the terms of the Supply Agreement, in exchange for a 4% equity interest in Healthspan, the Company agreed to initially supply NIAGEN&#174; to Healthspan free of charge and thereafter at a fixed price and, in exchange for an additional 5% equity interest in Healthspan, the Company will grant to Healthspan certain exclusive rights to resell NIAGEN&#174; in certain direct response channels.&#160;&#160;&#160;Healthspan will pay the Company royalties on the cumulative worldwide net sales of its finished products containing NIAGEN&#174;.&#160;&#160;The exclusivity rights will remain for so long as Healthspan meets certain minimum purchase requirements.&#160;&#160;In the event that, during the initial term, the Company terminates the exclusivity rights due to failure to meet the minimum purchase requirements or for any reason other than a material breach of the Supply Agreement by Healthspan, then the 5% equity interest shall be automatically redeemed for a purchase price of $1.00 effective upon the date of termination of the exclusivity rights.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	In connection with the foregoing, also on August 28, 2015, the Company and Healthspan entered into an interest purchase agreement and limited liability company agreement pursuant to which the Company was issued 9% of the outstanding equity interests of Healthspan.&#160;&#160;Robert Fried, a director of the Company, is the manager of Healthspan and owns 91% of the outstanding equity interests of Healthspan.&#160;&#160;The Supply Agreement, interest purchase agreement and limited liability company agreement were unanimously approved by the independent directors of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	-108-
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<A HREF="#CDXC_10K_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	As of January 2, 2016, the Company had not shipped any NIAGEN&#174; to Healthspan and Healthspan did not issue any equity interests to the Company.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, there is no accounting recognition of this arrangement for the twelve-month period ended on January 2, 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	On November 4, 2015, the Company entered into securities purchase agreements with Barry Honig, Michael Brauser and Frost Gamma Investments Trust, each beneficial owners of over 5% of our common stock, to raise an aggregate of $2,000,000 in a registered direct offering.&#160;&#160;Pursuant to the purchase agreements, the Company sold a total of 200,000 Units at a purchase price of $10.00 per Unit, with each Unit consisting of eight shares of the Company&#8217;s common stock and a warrant to purchase four shares of common stock at an exercise price of $1.50 and a term of 3 years.&#160;&#160;The offering was made pursuant to a prospectus supplement dated November 4, 2015 and an accompanying prospectus dated May 8, 2015 pursuant to the Company&#8217;s shelf registration statement on Form S-3 that was filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on May 8, 2015 and became effective on June 5, 2015 (File No.&#160;333-203204).&#160;The prospectus supplement registered the shares of common stock issued in the offering and the common stock underlying the warrants.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	The Company did not have any transactions with related persons during the years ended January 2, 2016, January 3, 2015 and December 28, 2013.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Review, approval or ratification of transactions with related persons.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	On an ongoing basis, the Audit Committee reviews all &#8220;related party transactions&#8221; (those transactions that are required to be disclosed in this Annual Report on Form 10-K by SEC Regulation S-K, Item 404 and under Nasdaq&#8217;s rules), if any, for potential conflicts of interest and all such transactions must be approved by the Audit Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Director Independence
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Under the NASDAQ Stock Market Marketplace Rules, a director will only qualify as an independent director if, in the opinion of our Board, that person does not have a relationship that would interfere with the exercise of independent judgment in carrying out the responsibilities of a director. The Board has determined that each of Stephen Allen, Stephen Block, Reid Dabney, Hugh Dunkerley, Jeff Baxter and Robert Fried has no material relationship with our Company and is independent within the independence requirements of Marketplace Rule 5605(a)(2) of the NASDAQ Stock Market, Inc. Frank L. Jaksch Jr. does not meet the independence standards because of he is the Chief Executive Officer of our Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_OFFICER_TRANSACTIONS>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	(1)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="88%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Audit fees relate to professional services rendered in connection with the audit of the Company&#8217;s annual financial statements and internal control over financial reporting and quarterly review of financial statements included in the Company&#8217;s Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	(2)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="88%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Audit-related fees include costs incurred for reviews of registration statements and consultations on various accounting matters in support of the Company&#8217;s financial statements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="4%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	(3)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="88%">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Tax fees consist of fees for tax compliance matters.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Policy for Pre-Approval of Independent Auditor Services
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	The Audit Committee&#8217;s policy is to pre-approve all audit and permissible non-audit services provided by the independent auditor. These services may include audit services, audit-related services, tax services and other services. Pre-approval is generally provided for up to one year and any pre-approval is detailed as to the specific service or category of service and is generally subject to a specific budget. The independent auditor and management are required to periodically communicate to the Audit Committee regarding the extent of services provided by the independent auditor in accordance with this pre-approval, and the fees for the services performed to date. The Audit Committee may also pre-approve particular services on a case-by-case basis.
</FONT>
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<A NAME="CDXC_EX10-44_HTM_PREAMBLE">
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
</A>
	Preamble
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Joint Development Agreement (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	JDA
</FONT>
	&#8221;), effective and binding as of the last date of signing of this JDA (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	EFFECTIVE DATE
</FONT>
	&#8221;), is between
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ChromaDex, Inc. Corporation
</FONT>
	&#160;(&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	COLLABORATION PARTNER
</FONT>
	&#8221;), a California corporation having its principle office at 10005 Muirlands Blvd., Irvine, CA 92618 and
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	The Procter &amp; Gamble Company
</FONT>
	(&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	P&amp;G
</FONT>
	&#8221;) an Ohio corporation having its principle office at One Procter &amp; Gamble Plaza, Cincinnati, Ohio 45202.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<A NAME="CDXC_EX10-44_HTM_BACKGROUND">
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
</A>
	Background
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	P&amp;G has unique skills, technology and know-how specific to the development and use of consumer product formulations desired by consumers and institutional users, and has the ability to manufacture and sell such products globally.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	COLLABORATION PARTNER has unique skills, technology and know-how specific to the research, development, production, and applications with respect to
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	nicotinamide riboside, including, but not limited to the salts, analogs, precursors, and intermediates thereof (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	NR
</FONT>
	&#8221;), and has the ability to commercially supply such materials in industrial quantities for incorporation into consumer products.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The PARTIES want to enter into a joint research type collaborative project, which utilizes each PARTY&#8217;s unique abilities. The project is intended to focus on the challenging goal of identifying and/or developing stable forms of NR that can be formulated into aqueous consumer product formulations sold by P&amp;G to provide breakthrough levels of consumer noticeable benefits.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The PARTIES recognize the highly uncertain nature of such a collaborative project, including the uncertainty regarding whether one or both PARTIES may develop new technologies and/or know-how of value to one or both of the PARTIES.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In consideration of the mutual promises contained in this JDA, and in consideration of the time, money and effort which will be expended by the respective PARTIES under this JDA, and in consideration for the specific know-how possessed by each PARTY, which they individually bring to the project to be conducted, the PARTIES agree that the project be undertaken in conjunction with one another under the following terms and conditions:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<A NAME="CDXC_EX10-44_HTM_AGREEMENT">
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
</A>
	Agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Definitions
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	General.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The capitalized terms defined in this JDA will have the meanings indicated for purposes of this JDA; non-capitalized terms have their ordinary meaning as determined by context, subject matter, and/or scope, except as noted in Paragraph 11.2(Construction). A list of defined terms with definitions or a cross-reference to the location of their respective definition within the JDA is set forth in
<!--EFPLACEHOLDER-->
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Schedule 1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Collaborative Project
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PROJECT.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The PARTIES will collaborate on the project, including key milestones and success criteria, set forth in Schedule 2.1 (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PROJECT
</FONT>
	&#8221;), which is expected to result in the development of STABLE NR and/or PRODUCTs intended for application in the COLLABORATION FIELD.&#160;&#160;The PARTIES may amend Schedule 2.1 by mutual agreement from time to time pursuant to Paragraph 11.4 (Entire Agreement / Amendment).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.1.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Summary of the PROJECT.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The PROJECT generally relates to the identification and use of STABLE NR in P&amp;G&#8217;s consumer products for the [*].
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">

	2.1.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Work Outside the Scope of the PROJECT.
</FONT>
	Notwithstanding anything to contrary in this JDA, the following work is independent from the PROJECT:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">

	2.1.2.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	methods of synthesizing NR; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 153PT">

	2.1.2.2.&#160;&#160;

</TD>

	physically isolating NR from the external environment&#160;&#160;&#160;via particle coating or microencapsulation.
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Funding.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	[*] INDICATES CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN OMITTED PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT AND HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Confidentiality
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Disclosure of INFORMATION.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In connection with discussions under this JDA, it might be necessary for one or both PARTIES to disclose proprietary information to the other PARTY relating to the PROJECT. Such proprietary information may include product specifications, product samples and/or business plans. The PARTY disclosing (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DISCLOSER
</FONT>
	&#8221;) its proprietary information (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INFORMATION
</FONT>
	&#8221;) to the other PARTY (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	RECEIVER
</FONT>
	&#8221;) will disclose INFORMATION under the following conditions, which are understood to be acceptable to the RECEIVER.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.1.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Held in Confidence.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	INFORMATION disclosed to the RECEIVER will be held in confidence by the RECEIVER.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.1.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Reasonable Steps.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The RECEIVER will take such steps as may be reasonably necessary to prevent the disclosure of INFORMATION to THIRD PARTIES.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.1.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Limited Use.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The RECEIVER will not disclose or utilize INFORMATION other than for the PROJECT; without first having obtained the written consent of the DISCLOSER to such disclosure or utilization.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Limits to Obligations of Confidentiality.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The commitments set forth in Paragraph 3.1 (Disclosure of INFORMATION) will not extend to any portion of INFORMATION which the RECEIVER can prove:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	is known to the RECEIVER prior to the receipt from the DISCLOSER under this JDA or is information generally available to the public;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	hereafter, through no act of the RECEIVER, becomes information generally available to the public;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	corresponds to information furnished to the RECEIVER by a THIRD PARTY having a bona fide right to do so and not having any confidential obligation, direct or indirect, to the DISCLOSER with respect to the same;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	corresponds to information furnished by the DISCLOSER to any THIRD PARTY on a non-confidential basis; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.2.5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	was developed by the RECEIVER independently of the disclosure of INFORMATION by the DISCLOSER as established by competent documentary evidence.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Required Disclosure by Law / Regulation.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;If RECEIVER is required by law or government regulation to disclose DISCLOSER INFORMATION (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	COMPELLED DISCLOSURE
</FONT>
	&#8221;), then RECEIVER will:&#160;&#160;&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(a)
</FONT>
	provide prompt reasonable prior notice to the DISCLOSER of the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE so that DISCLOSER may take steps to protect DISCLOSER&#8217;s confidential information, and
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(b)
</FONT>
	provide reasonable cooperation to DISCLOSER in DISCLOSER&#8217;s protecting against the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE and/or obtaining a protective order narrowing the scope of the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE or use of the INFORMATION.&#160;&#160;If DISCLOSER is unable to obtain such protection against the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE, then despite the commitments set forth in Paragraph 3.1 (Disclosure of INFORMATION) RECIPIENT will be entitled to disclose the DISCLOSER&#8217;s INFORMATION
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(aa)
</FONT>
	only as and to the extent necessary to legally comply with the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE and
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	(bb)
</FONT>
	on condition that RECIPIENT exercises reasonable efforts to obtain reliable assurance that the DISCLOSER&#8217;s INFORMATION is treated as confidential to the extent allowable by the law or government regulation requiring the COMPELLED DISCLOSURE.&#160;&#160;Such COMPELLED DISCLOSURE does not otherwise waive the non-use and confidentiality obligations set forth in Paragraph 3.1 (Disclosure of INFORMATION) with respect to other uses and/or other disclosures of such INFORMATION.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	-3-
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	[*] INDICATES CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN OMITTED PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT AND HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INVENTIONs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Considered INFORMATION.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;INVENTIONs will be considered INFORMATION of the owning PARTY(IES), as ownership is set forth in Article 4 (INVENTION Rights). If one PARTY is relieved of its obligations of confidentiality pursuant to any subparagraphs of Paragraph 3.2 (Limits to Obligations of Confidentiality), then the other PARTY will also be considered so relieved of its obligations of confidentiality with respect to the subject INFORMATION.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Form of Disclosure.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;INFORMATION will be subject to obligations of confidentiality and restrictions on use or disclosure under this JDA only if it is either:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.5.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in writing or other tangible form bearing the date of disclosure and clearly marked as &#8220;confidential&#8221; when disclosed; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.5.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	if not in tangible form (e.g., disclosed orally or observed), then identified as confidential when revealed and summarized in a writing clearly marked as &#8220;confidential&#8221; and delivered to the RECEIVER within 30 days of such disclosure.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.6.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Termination of Confidentiality Obligations.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The obligations of confidentiality and restrictions on use under this Article 3 will cease 5 years from the end of the TERM.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INVENTION Rights
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INVENTION Rights.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;P&amp;G will own all INVENTIONs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Licenses to INVENTIONS.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.2.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INVENTIONS in the COLLABORATION FIELD.
</FONT>
	Upon termination or expiry of this JDA, if there is no commercial agreement between the PARTIES for the purchase of NR by P&amp;G from COLLABORATION PARTNER then P&amp;G will grant to COLLABORATION PARTNER a reasonable-royalty bearing, exclusive, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide license to PATENT RIGHTS for INVENTIONS in the COLLABORATION FIELD.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	-4-
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage125"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	[*] INDICATES CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN OMITTED PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT AND HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.2.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	OUTSIDE-THE-COLLABORATION FIELD INVENTIONS.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	P&amp;G hereby grants COLLABORATION PARTNER an exclusive royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide license to PATENT RIGHTS for OUTSIDE-THE-COLLABORATION FIELD INVENTIONS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.2.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	License Term.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The licenses in Paragraph 4.2.1 (INVENTIONS in the COLLABORATION FIELD) and 4.2.2 (OUTSIDE-THE-COLLABORATION FIELD INVENTIONS) will terminate upon expiration of the last of the relevant PATENT RIGHTS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.2.4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Licenses Subject to Confidentiality Obligation.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;The licenses granted pursuant to this Article 4 are subject to the confidentiality obligations set forth in Article
<A HREF="#CDXC_EX10-44_HTM__REF99343656">
	3
</A>
	(Confidentiality).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Cooperation in Transferring Title.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The PARTIES will cooperate fully with each other and/or the other PARTY's attorneys in vesting title as provided in Paragraph 4.1 (INVENTION Rights).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Notification of INVENTIONs.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;Each PARTY will provide the other PARTY with timely notification in writing of all INVENTIONs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PROSECUTION of Patent Applications.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;P&amp;G will conduct PROSECUTION of any patent applications filed on INVENTIONS at its sole discretion and will be responsible for costs associated with such PROSECUTION.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.6.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Statutory Inventor Payments.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Despite Paragraph 4.5 (PROSECUTION of Patent Applications), any payments, other obligations, and/or acts due to an inventor under statutory national laws will be the responsibility of the inventor&#8217;s employer. Neither PARTY will be obligated to indemnify, support, and/or remind the inventor&#8217;s employer of any such payments, other obligations, and/or acts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.7.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Review of Patent Applications Prior to Filing.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;A PARTY will not file any patent application that discloses INFORMATION of the other PARTY and/or claims an INVENTION without prior notice to, and review by, the other PARTY. The reviewing PARTY will be given at least 20 BUSINESS DAYs in which to review and comment on the patent application, unless the reviewing PARTY agrees on a term which is shorter than 20 BUSINESS DAYs. The reviewing PARTY will have the right to require that any INFORMATION of the reviewing PARTY be removed from the patent application, in accordance with Article
<A HREF="#CDXC_EX10-44_HTM__REF99342801">
	3
</A>
	(Confidentiality); with the limited exception that those portions of INFORMATION that are INVENTIONs and are required to be disclosed by the filing PARTY in the subject patent application to secure patent rights to PRODUCT INVENTIONs and/or STABLE NR INVENTIONs entitled to the filing PARTY under this JDA, may remain in the patent application.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	-5-
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	[*] INDICATES CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN OMITTED PURSUANT TO A REQUEST FOR CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT AND HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE COMMISSION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Work With THIRD PARTIES
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	5.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Work with THIRD PARTIES.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Neither PARTY will, during the TERM, conduct collaborative work with any THIRD PARTY for a project within the COLLABORATION FIELD.&#160;&#160;Either PARTY is otherwise free to enter into other collaborative and/or service projects with any THIRD PARTY.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sampling of NR
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sampling.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;COLLABORATION PARTNER grants P&amp;G the right to sample NR within P&amp;G to explore physically isolating NR from the external environment via particle coating or microencapsulation and methods for synthesizing NR, as set forth in Paragraph 2.1.2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sampling Inventions.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;For purposes of clarification, any work result, creative idea, development, or invention, whether or not patentable, conceived as a direct result of the sampling pursuant to Paragraph 6.1 (Sampling) will
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	not
</FONT>
	be considered &#8220;a direct result of work conducted under this JDA&#8221; and therefore not subject to any INVENTION rights obligations under this JDA.&#160;&#160;In the absence of a separate invention rights agreement governing such sampling, common law inventorship rights will apply.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Purchase Requirements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	.
</FONT>
	In the event a) sampling in Paragraph 6.1 (Sampling) and Paragraph 6.2 (Sampling Inventions) results in any creative idea, design development, invention, know-how, or work result (whether patentable or not patentable); b) there is no commercial agreement between the PARTIES for the purchase of NR or STABLE NR by P&amp;G from COLLABORATION PARTNER; and c) if P&amp;G launches a [*] product containing NR or STABLE NR within 2 years from the date of Termination of this JDA; P&amp;G will purchase its requirements for NR for use either by itself or in the preparation of STABLE NR in connection with [*] from COLLABORATION PARTNER at COLLABORATION PARTNER&#8217;S MFN PRICING for a period of or 3 years from the date of the first retail sale of any such PRODUCT.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Confidentiality of Sampled Materials.
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;P&amp;G will treat sampled NR and related COLLABORATION PARTNER INFORMATION as INFORMATION pursuant to Article 3 (Confidentiality).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	7.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Term and Termination
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	7.1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Term.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	This JDA is effective from the EFFECTIVE DATE and terminates 2 years from the EFFECTIVE DATE unless terminated earlier under Paragraph 7.2 (Termination of JDA) or Paragraph 10.1 (Resulting Supply Agreement) (&#8220;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	TERM
</FONT>
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	7.2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Expiration / Termination of JDA.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Either PARTY may terminate this JDA at any time by giving written notice to the other PARTY at least 90 days before such termination becomes effective.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	7.3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Surviving Rights &amp; Obligations.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Termination or expiration of this JDA will not relieve either PARTY of any obligations accruing prior to such termination or expiration, including those set forth in Articles 3 (Confidentiality), 4 (INVENTION Rights), 6 (Sampling of NR), 7.4 (Non-circumvent); 8 (Arbitration), and 10 (Supply); and Paragraph 11.6 (Negotiations on Royalties).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

	-6-
</FONT>

<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
